name: Iron Fist of the Demon King: New Year Special Demo
name_original: Iron Fist of the Demon King: New Year Special Demo
description:
Originally intended to be for Christmas, to celebrate the New Year I'll give you an updated version of Iron Fist of the Demon's demo.

What's New about this demo?

-half of chapter 2, which includes several bosses (and optional bosses), an entire dungeon, plot details and more. Explore the Unkind Freezer and fight the dragon, Krieg!
-alterations to certain sprites
-bug fixes
-text fixes
-various small alterations to experiment with the gameplay and other things
-small alterations to to the combat and UI
-Controller support? (untested, so not guaranteed to work)

(Warning! This version hasn't been fully playtested so despite my best attempts there may exist some bugs, spelling and grammar errors, weird errors with text and images, sprites not looking quite right and of course difficulty balance so just be aware and let me know if you experience anything gamebreaking)
